[i](Choose only one work as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
When The Art of War enters the battlefield, if a source you control would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead.
{2}{R}{R}: [i]Laying Plans[/i]
The first time you attack each turn, untap each creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
{2}{R}{R}: [i]Waging War[/i]
Whenever a creature you control attacks, create a token copy of it that’s tapped and attacking, except the token isn’t legendary. Exile those tokens at end of combat.
